Class RequestMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joyrest.routing.matcher.RequestMatcher

extends Object
    Helper utility class for matching an incoming requests against a route configuration
    Author:
    pbouda

      • matchProduces

        public static boolean matchProduces(InternalRoute route,
                                    InternalRequest<?> request)
        Matches route produces configuration and Accept-header in an incoming request
        Parameters:
        route - route configuration
        request - incoming request object
        Returns:
        returns true if the given route has produces Media-Type one of an Accept from an incoming request

      • matchConsumes

        public static boolean matchConsumes(InternalRoute route,
                                    InternalRequest<?> request)
        Matches route consumes configuration and Content-Type header in an incoming request
        Parameters:
        route - route configuration
        request - incoming request object
        Returns:

      • matchHttpMethod

        public static boolean matchHttpMethod(InternalRoute route,
                                      InternalRequest<?> request)
        Matches route an http method in an incoming request
        Parameters:
        route - route configuration
        request - incoming request object
        Returns:
        returns true if the given route has the same http method as an incoming request
